venue.address_1: Intersection of Mass Ave, Osgood st, and Andover st
venue.name: North Andover Town Common

item.description: Come and enjoy the last day of the Children's Shows offered at the North Andover Town Common. You can bring a blanket or fold up chairs, pack snacks & drinks. The show is 1 hour long, but we can stick around a bit longer and get to know each other.
item.name: Benjamin The Juggling Clown @ North Andover Town Common
